name: It`s Village
description:
Will it have to build your village?
In It's Village you take control of the village and will decide in which direction to develop it. You will have many opportunities for development, but you will need to fear the terrible skeletons that will destroy your city.
In the game there is a small number of different buildings that will form your city.

Features: [/ b]
- Scenario Mode
- Free play. Develop in any direction without any restrictions. The whole world is available to you.
- Each game is unique. Map Scenario mode and free play is generated randomly.
- Relax at any time, because the game has the save system
- Select the game difficulty. From harmless to hard for the hardcore.
